vocabinfos.mediumDef:
1) to gasp, pant, pant after, long for, breathe heavily
1a) (Qal)
1a1) to gasp, pant after, snuff up
1a2) to gasp or pant (with desire), pant after, be eager for
1a3) to thirst for one's blood (from actions of animals) (fig)
§ 1) to gasp, pant, pant after, long for, breathe heavily
1a) (Qal)
1a1) to gasp, pant after, snuff up
1a2) to gasp or pant (with desire), pant after, be eager for
1a3) to thirst for one's blood (from actions of animals) (fig)
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) qal   respirar entrecortadamente, jadear; (b) qal   jadear tras = anhelar; (c) qal   jadear tras = perseguir = oprimir
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 渴望, 渴求, 喘氣, 喘息
1a) (Qal)
1a1) 切望, 渴望, 喘息
1a2) (帶著慾望) 渴望, 喘息
2) 踐踏, 蹂躪
2a) (Qal) 蹂躪, 踐踏
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) 渴望, 渴求, 喘气, 喘息
1a) (Qal)
1a1) 切望, 渴望, 喘息
1a2) (带着欲望) 渴望, 喘息
2) 践踏, 蹂躏
2a) (Qal) 蹂躏, 践踏

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
1) to crush, trample, trample upon
1a) (Qal) to trample upon, crush
